body.name: CestMall Mini Steam Iron for Clothes, 90° Rotating Portable Steamer Travel Mini Steam Iron, 1000W Iron Steamer Support Dry and Wet Ironing 2 in 1 Fast Heat-Up for Home Travel College

features: 【Multi-functional Design】--The mini iron is designed for garment ironing hanging and flat ironing, making it a versatile tool for all your ironing needs. It also features a 90-degree swivel handle for easy operation.

【Wet and Dry Ironing】--Travel mini steam iron with titanium work surface panel, large contact area, dry ironing can be easily ironed, 30 seconds to remove wrinkles; evenly distributed axially arranged steam holes, a key to get continuous and strong steam, and wet ironing speed, quickly ironing deep wrinkles.
【Easy to carry】--Steamer iron for clothes is small and very space-saving, can be carried around, can easily fit into luggage and backpack, convenient to carry anywhere.
【Convenient and Efficient】--The mini steamer iron unique oval design makes it easy to iron buttons, lapels and any hard-to-reach areas.
【Convenient Features】--Our mini steamer comes with a 1.5m power cord and also includes a water cup accessory for easy water supply and steam ironing.

【ATTENTION】: 1. Preheat must be completely: After plugging in the power, I recommend waiting at least 30 seconds to preheat before pressing the steam button, because the water needs to reach a certain temperature to become steam, if you press the steam button in advance, the water has not reached the steam temperature, the high temperature pressure in the tank will squeeze out the water without atomization, which is the cause of most leaks.

【ATTENTION】: 2. When using, avoid turning the product completely upside down. After use, pour out the excess water in the tank to avoid leakage from the water inlet when the product is inverted or stored.
【ATTENTION】: 3. If you are traveling to Europe or other countries, please use a plug with voltage conversion, the adapter without voltage conversion function will cause damage to the steam iron.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: After the flashing lights stop, press the steam button again, otherwise there will be water splashing! NOTICE: <1>. There is only 1 steam setting, the amount of steam cannot be adjusted, if you want to iron woven fabrics, you can lay a piece of cloth on top of the ironed clothes before ironing.<2>. Preheat must be completely: After plugging in the power, I recommend waiting at least 30 seconds (i.e., When the light stops blinking) to preheat before pressing the steam button, because the water needs to reach a certain temperature to become steam, if you press the steam button in advance, the water has not reached the steam temperature, the high temperature pressure in the tank will squeeze out the water without atomization, which is the cause of most leaks.<3>. When using, avoid turning the product completely upside down. After use, pour out the excess water in the tank to avoid leakage from the water inlet when the product is inverted or stored.<4>. Before leaving the factory, we will test the product, and it is not a product that has been used twice, please rest assured.<5>. If you are traveling to Europe or other countries, please use a plug with voltage conversion, the adapter without voltage conversion function will cause damage to the steam iron.

Sharp curved design 360-degree all-around ironing allows flexible ironing of narrow areas such as buttons, lapels, and collars, allowing details to be shown elegantly. Indicator light comes on Indicator light blinks to indicate that the water in the tank is boiling, light blinking stops to indicate that the water has boiled and can be turned to steam mode. Handle can be rotated 90° The handle is very comfortable, you can also rotate the angle according to your needs, can be flat ironing and hanging iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Nice for travel. We took for a wedding out of town and a work trip so far and everyone was using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good travel iron
reviews.reviewText: I was wondering that the size would be a problem, but I changed completely my mind after the first try. It makes its job correctly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, short cord
reviews.reviewText: The steamer works well and is compact, but the cord is too short. It makes it difficult to find the right spot in a hotel room where you can hang clothes and be plugged in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use. Compact for travel touch-ups. Excellent value for modest price
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Compact for travel touch-ups. Excellent value for modest price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s the perfect size, and I love that the head can twist. I bought it to fit in my carry-on while I travel. But it arrived with a busted on and off button. It’s very flimsy and cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: works good, does what it is made to do and a good portable size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Little but good!
reviews.reviewText: This little guy is good for travel. Nothing beats a good ol' iron but this does the job if you're traveling and need to touch up your shirt or something. I haven't had an issue with leakage or anything yet. Multiple passes are required when using this iron for bigger creases and wrinkles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars At home or for travel.
reviews.reviewText: Most fabrics don’t wrinkle much, so it’s a hassle to get out an ironing board and a big heavy iron for those few wrinkles. This has solved the problem completely. I just put a towel on the table and put the garment on it while this little iron is heating up. Extremely lightweight, it’s easy to use, very compact to store, and does the job of the big irons. I highly recommend this for home or travel.

This little steamer iron is impressive as it heats up fast and irons over clothes easily. My regular sized iron takes some time to heat and it takes a few passes for wrinkles to go away. It doesn’t take much enough for this iron to remove wrinkles. I like the titanium plate in the bottom. It is smooth and is durable. Due to the small size of the iron it is easy to navigate around buttons and collars. I find this easier to use and faster compared to a regular sized iron. This iron is perfect for traveling. It can be used instead of the dirty ones at the hotel rooms. It is advised to give the iron about some time (about 30 seconds) to fully heat up before starting and also to drain out any remaining water in the iron to prevent leaks. Overall, a good value and a functioning mini iron.

reviews.reviewTitle: I brought it to my trip.
reviews.reviewText: I brought it to my business trip. It was very helpful to remover winkles from my suits.

This is a decent mini steam iron. I'm impressed on how It does heats up very fast and ready to be used.it's very portable, so it will be good travelling. It has Steam and Dry ironing function.The steamer works well. It can also iron clothes while cloth is on hanger. It can be rotated 90 degrees.however, I have few things I do not like about the mini steamer.The wire cord is too short. I case where the electric power outlet is not so close, this mini steamer will not have anywhere to be plugged in.When holding the handle, it feels crampy as my hands could hold the handle properly, there is not give good clearance for my hand, so I was not able to hold the handle very well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Compact Powerhouse – A Traveler's Dream Iron
reviews.reviewText: The Mini Steam Iron for Clothes has been a remarkable addition to my travel gear. Its 90° rotating feature is a standout, allowing me to deftly maneuver around buttons and pleats with ease. The 1000W power is impressive for its size, producing a strong steam that smooths out wrinkles efficiently, which is quite the feat for a portable steamer.One of the things I love about this iron is its dual dry and wet ironing capabilities. Whether I'm in a hurry to touch up a shirt with the dry heat or need to steam out the suitcase creases from a dress, this little gadget has me covered. It heats up quickly, saving me precious time when I'm on the go.Its compact size is perfect for stowing away in my luggage without taking up much space or adding excessive weight. Despite its small stature, the water reservoir is adequately sized, so I'm not constantly refilling it during a single ironing session.The design is sleek and modern, and it feels sturdy in the hand. The handle is comfortable to hold, reducing fatigue, which is especially appreciated after a long day of travel.

Great iron that can be used either wet or dry. I mainly use the stream function to quickly steam away wrinkles while the garment is still on the hanger. It avoids me having to take out the ironing board to dry iron the garment. The ability to rotate the head 90 degrees, helps with even more surface coverage for faster steaming. I am also using distilled water in the steam iron to prevent any mineral deposits in the steaming system. This mini steam iron is great for a quick steam to refresh a wrinkled garment for immediate wear.
